Multiple Facebook posts published on Mar: 2019, contain two photos of Donald Trump holding up a white shirt, one showing the front and the other showing the back.
On the back of the shirt: there is a circular logo with a fist in the middle.
A reverse image search traced the mislea: a British newspaper, dated July 12, 2018, which shows the original photos of Trump holding a white shirt with his surname on the back and the logo of the England football team on the front.
